Articles.Content: The 502 is approaching. It is letting its presence known in advance.

> 
> Is it possible to DDOS the 502 page?

Challenge accepted.
It took me like 15 tries to finally log on. For some reason that made me happy.

484 pages from 330-something? In what, less than an hour?

Also, the forum is slowing! HYPE!
We appear to have stopped the bad gateways.
The might not be more than 500 pages. The forum might die;.;
KSP addicts all over the world hammering F5 like crazy ... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Crap guys what are you smoking ? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Forum started to be in one hell ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
![maxresdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-70-nYsoHL0/maxresdefault.jpg)

> 
> Here comes the crescendo...!

The Whackjob is here! 500 is a GO!
How many people are online? The page wont show up for me.

> 
> Crap guys what are you smoking ? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

What *aren't* we smoking!
Full hype ahead!!!

never!
count down 100... 99...
Our happiness will stop the errors! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
c'mon is half an hour
Come on urrrzzzz
Hype!
the server room at Squad must feel like a suana

> What *aren't* we smoking!

Water
